description: This file defines a React functional component called StatusBar, which displays the current game status for a two-player tic-tac-toe game. It shows the current player's turn, announces the winner, or indicates a draw, based on props passed to it.

methods.name: StatusBar({ currentPlayer, winner, isDraw })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the game status message including current turn, winner, or draw status.

ctags.name: StatusBar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function StatusBar({ currentPlayer, winner, isDraw }) {$/
